amendment.description: Amendment provides that assistance to the PLO will be available only for the period beginning 3 months after enactment of the bill and for 6 months thereafter only if the President certifies to Congress that certain conditions have been met.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed the House Report 105-184, to suspend assistance to the Palestine Liberation Organization authority for a period of 90 days. Assistance could resume after 90 days only after the President submits a report to Congress certifying that the PLO has undertaken specific and positive actions on a variety of issues, including apprehension of terrorists and recinding the imposition of the death penalty for the sale of land to Jew.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Saxton amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
